title: Make a reservation (non-digital) - Either choose a team without digital ticketing or disable the Department switch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 
User is signed in to Arizona Diamondbacks team as Bangash, Nasir user
custom_steps:
WHEN
Click on Home
AND click on October 1st, 2016
AND checked mark 'Mr.'
AND enters First Name and Last Name  as (Mark and Andrew) 
AND under Choose Ticket Location, check mark Family FCFS
AND select reg @ 45.00 
AND enter No. of Tickets = 1
AND select Box Office2
AND click on Save
custom_expected:
THEN
A ticket reservation is made for that specific date

A new pop up window page will say " Seats listed above are subject to change by the traveling secretary.Reservation Complete! Make Another Reservation?"  No or Yes.

title: (Not Done) Make a reservation (digital)
(Not Done) Verify event messaging displays for a configured department user
(Not Done) Verify a reservation cannot be made for an expired event based on department configuration
Check Reservations - Verify reservations are recorded
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User is signed in to Arizona Diamondbacks team as Bangash, Nasir user
AND a reservation has been made in past for October 1st, 2016
custom_steps:
WHEN 
Click on CHECK RESERVATIONS
custom_expected:
THEN
The reservation is shown in the Check Reservations table

title: Check Reservations - Verify an unfulfilled reservation can be deleted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User is signed in to Arizona Diamondbacks team as Bangash, Nasir user
AND Reservation has been made in past for October 1st, 2016
custom_steps:
WHEN 
Click on CHECK RESERVATIONS
AND click on Edit, next to that game
AND click on Delete
custom_expected:
THEN 
A message is pops up, 'Do you want to delete this reservation?' clicking on 'Ok', deletes the reservation

title: Transfer Tickets - Transfer tickets to another user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User is signed in to Arizona Diamondbacks team as Bangash, Nasir user
custom_steps:
WHEN
Click on Transfer Tickets 
AND click on the Transfer Tickets again in the list
AND click on October 2nd, 2016
AND under the Transfer Tickets, check mark 'To another user'
AND check mark the Family FCFS 
AND Transfer To: (select a user e.g. Prajapti Krishna)
AND enter No. of ticket = 1
AND click on Continue
custom_expected:
THEN
A message window pops up with the Transfer Ticket information, clicking on Transfer Now, transfers the ticket to that particular (Prajapti Krishna) user

title: Transfer Tickets - Check the status of the transfer
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User is signed in to Arizona Diamondbacks team as Bangash, Nasir user
AND Transfer Ticket funtion has been performed in the past
custom_steps:
WHEN 
Click on Tansfer Tickets
AND click on Check Transfers
custom_expected:
THEN 
The status of all Ticket transfer is shown

title: My Profile - Update e-mail address
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User is signed in to Arizona Diamondbacks team as Bangash, Nasir user
custom_steps:
WHEN 
Click on My Profile
AND click and enter a new email address
AND click on update
custom_expected:
THEN 
A message pops up saying 'Email updated successfully!'

title: My Profile - Update password
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User is signed in to Arizona Diamondbacks team as Bangash, Nasir user
custom_steps:
WHEN 
Click on My Profile
AND under New Password and Confirm Password, entered a password (e.g. baseball) 
AND click on Update
custom_expected:
THEN
A message pops up 'Password updated successfully'

title: My Profile - Update security question and answer
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User is signed in to Arizona Diamondbacks team as Bangash, Nasir user
custom_steps:
WHEN 
Clicked on My Profile
And under the Security Question, clicked on the dropdown arrow and select  'Whats is your pet's name?'
AND entered the Answer as 'Bobby'
AND click on 'update'
custom_expected:
THEN
A message pops up 'Security Question and security Answer update successfully'

title: Manage Guest Users - Add a new guest user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User is signed in as Arizona Diamondback and Bangash, Nasir
custom_steps:
WHEN 
Click on 'Manage Guest User'
AND click on '+Add'
AND under the Manage Guest User filled the First, Last, Middle Name and Email Address as Bob, Charles, Smith and test@mlb.com respectively)
AND click on Save
custom_expected:
THEN 
A new guest user is added

title: Manage Guest Users - Edit an existing guest user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User is signed in to Arizona Diamondbacks team as Bangash, Nasir user
custom_steps:
WHEN
Click on 'Manage Guest User'
AND click on the 'Edit' next to the user name which you want to edit
AND enter the First name: Charles (or make some changes to last name, email address on the page)
AND when clicked on "Save"
custom_expected:
THEN 
User information is edited/updated

title: Manage Guest Users - Delete an existing guest user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User is signed in to Arizona Diamondbacks team as Bangash, Nasir user
custom_steps:
WHEN
Click on 'Manage Guest User'
AND click on the 'Edit' next to the user name which you want to delete
AND click on 'Delete'
custom_expected:
THEN
User is deleted

title: Ticketing Report - Verify report displays reservations and status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User is signed in to Arizona Diamondbacks team as Bangash, Nasir user
custom_steps:
WHEN 
Click on Ticketing Report
custom_expected:
THEN 
All the ticketing report is displayed

title: Split Reservation - Verify fulfilled reservations are visible
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User is signed in to Arizona Diamondbacks team as Bangash, Nasir user
AND reservation has been made in the past for more than one ticket for the same event
custom_steps:
WHEN 
Click on Split Reservation
custom_expected:
THEN
Reservation with fulfilled reservation shows Translate radio button under the Action column.

title: Split Reservation - Verify you can split a reservation with another user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User is signed in to Arizona Diamondbacks team as Bangash, Nasir user
AND reservation has been made in the past for more than one ticket for the same event (For future game)
custom_steps:
WHEN 
Click on Split Reservation
AND enter the first and last name
AND select pickup location:Box Office2
AND Quantitiy: 1
AND click on Split
AND entered the user information
custom_expected:
THEN
Ticket is split, given to another user

Edit - Add a Club pickup location
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Login into Comptix Site >>https://qabamutil.mlbcontrol.net/ticketing-admin/login.jsp
AND Select an Account: Team Name (Ex. Arizona Diamondback)
AND Select an User: Pick a name (ex. Prajapati,Krishna)
AND Click : Login button
custom_steps:
WHEN
Top right click User's name ex. Welcome (User's name)
AND Select >Roles>GlobalUser
AND Select>Admin Home
AND Click 'Venue' blue link 
AND Click 'Edit' red button 
AND Click '+Add' red button 
AND Select any one Department ex. Coaches.  
AND enter any description for 'Pickup Location' ex. Window
AND click 'Submit' button
custom_expected:
THEN
Department drop down shown, Pickup Location , Submit button, and Cancel button displayed.
AND New added pickup location will display under 'Pickup Locations(clubs).  See Pickup Location SS.

title: Edit - Add an Umpire pickup location
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Login into Comptix Site >>https://qabamutil.mlbcontrol.net/ticketing-admin/login.jsp
AND Select an Account: Team Name (Ex. Arizona Diamondback)
AND Select an User: Pick a name (ex. Prajapati,Krishna)
AND Click : Login button
custom_steps:
WHEN
Top right click User's name ex. Welcome (User's name)
AND Select >Roles>GlobalUser
AND Select>Admin Home
AND Click 'Venue' blue link 
AND Click 'Edit' red button 
AND Click '+Add' red button 
AND enter any description for 'add Pickup Location' ex. Window
AND click 'Submit' button
custom_expected:
THEN
add Pickup Location , Submit button, and Cancel button displayed.
AND New added pickup location will display under 'Umpire Pickup Locations(clubs).  See Pickup Location SS.

title: Edit - Delete the newly created pickup location for Club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Login into Comptix Site >>https://qabamutil.mlbcontrol.net/ticketing-admin/login.jsp
AND Select an Account: Team Name (Ex. Arizona Diamondback)
AND Select an User: Pick a name (ex. Prajapati,Krishna)
AND Click : Login button
custom_steps:
WHEN
Top right click User's name ex. Welcome (User's name)
AND Select >Roles>GlobalUser
AND Select>Admin Home
AND Click 'Venue' blue link 
AND Click 'Edit' red button 
AND Click '- Remove' red button for the location you created in previous Test  case[Edit - Add a Club pickup location] ex (WIndow)
custom_expected: THEN under 'Pickup Locations(clubs) should be removed 'Window' and should not see that name listed.

title: Edit - Delete thew newly created pickup location for Umpire
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Login into Comptix Site
AND LINK>>https://qabamutil.mlbcontrol.net/ticketing-admin/login.jsp
AND Select an Account: Team Name (Ex. Arizona Diamondback)
AND Select an User: Pick your name (ex. Prajapati,Krishna)
AND Click : Login button
custom_steps:
WHEN
Top right click User's name ex. Welcome (User's name)
AND Select >Roles>GlobalUser
AND Select>Admin Home
AND Click 'Venue' blue link 
AND Click 'Edit' red button 
AND Click '- Remove' red button for the location you created in previous Test  case[Edit - Add an Umpire pickup location] ex (WIndow)
custom_expected: THEN under 'Pickup Locations(clubs) should be removed 'Window' and should not see that name listed.

title: Seating - Club Inventory - Add a new section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Login into Comptix Site >>https://qabamutil.mlbcontrol.net/ticketing-admin/login.jsp
AND Select an Account: Team Name (Ex. Arizona Diamondback)
AND Select an User: Pick a name (ex. Prajapati,Krishna)
AND Click : Login button
custom_steps:
WHEN
Top right click User's name ex. Welcome (User's name)
AND Select >Roles>GlobalUser
AND Select>Admin Home
AND Click 'Venue' blue link 
AND Click 'Seating' red button 
AND select 'Club Inventory' tab and click '+Add'  red 
AND enter following fields: 
> Section #   ex. Seat1
>Pricing    ex.100
>Select Home/Visitor   : Home
>Select Firend/Family  : Friend
>Select Department    : Coaches 
AND then click Continue blue button
custom_expected:
THEN 'Add New Section' window opens up.  
AND Your New Seciton name added under 'Club Inventory' tab.  See CI_Add New Section SS.

title: Seating - Club Inventory - Add new row by selecting by range
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Login into Comptix Site >>https://qabamutil.mlbcontrol.net/ticketing-admin/login.jsp
AND Select an Account: Team Name (Ex. Arizona Diamondback)
AND Select an User: Pick a name (ex. Prajapati,Krishna)
AND Click : Login button
custom_steps:
WHEN
Top right click User's name ex. Welcome (User's name)
AND Select >Roles>GlobalUser
AND Select>Admin Home
AND Click 'Venue' blue link 
AND Click 'Seating' red button 
AND Find the 'new section that you added in previous Test Case [Seating - Club Inventory - Add a new section] ' ex. Seat1
AND select 'Club Inventory' tab and click '+Edit'  red 
AND click  '+Add' red button  
AND click 'Select Range' red button
AND enter following fields:
>Row No  ex.A1
>Range of Seats  ex. 1
>Through   ex. 10
AND click 'Save' button
custom_expected:
THEN 'Edit Secion' window opens up. 
AND following fields display: Select Range , One At A Time and Cancel.
AND following fields display: Row No, Range of Seats  and Through   
AND under 'Add Seats: you will see Row and Seat display that you just added.  

Note: attached two SS.

title: Seating - Club Inventory - Remove newly created row
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Login into Comptix Site >>https://qabamutil.mlbcontrol.net/ticketing-admin/login.jsp
AND Select an Account: Team Name (Ex. Arizona Diamondback)
AND Select an User: Pick a name (ex. Prajapati,Krishna)
AND Click : Login button
custom_steps:
WHEN
Top right click User's name ex. Welcome (User's name)
AND Select >Roles>GlobalUser
AND Select>Admin Home
AND Click 'Venue' blue link 
AND Click 'Seating' red button 
AND Find the 'new section that you added in previous Test Case [Seating - Club Inventory - Add a new section] ' ex. Seat1
AND select 'Club Inventory' tab and click '+Edit'  red 
AND clcik '-Remove' red button that you added new seats in previous test case [Seating - Club Inventory - Add new one at a time ] 
AND Click 'Save' or 'Cancel' button
custom_expected:
THEN 'Edit Secion' window opens up. 
AND under 'Add Seats:  Newly created Row will be deleted.

title: Seating - Club Inventory - Add new one at a time
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Login into Comptix Site >>https://qabamutil.mlbcontrol.net/ticketing-admin/login.jsp
AND Select an Account: Team Name (Ex. Arizona Diamondback)
AND Select an User: Pick a name (ex. Prajapati,Krishna)
AND Click : Login button
custom_steps:
WHEN
Top right click User's name ex. Welcome (User's name)
AND Select >Roles>GlobalUser
AND Select>Admin Home
AND Click 'Venue' blue link 
AND Click 'Seating' red button 
AND Find the 'new section that you added in previous Test Case [Seating - Club Inventory - Add a new section] ' ex. Seat1
AND select 'Club Inventory' tab and click '+Edit'  red 
AND click  '+Add' red button  
AND click 'One At A Time' red button
AND enter folloinng fields:
>Row No  ex.B1
> No Of Seats ex. 5
AND click 'Add Seat' button
AND enter Seat Numbers on the empty line ex. 1,2,3,4,5
AND Click 'Save' button
custom_expected:
THEN 'Edit Secion' window opens up. 
AND following fields display: Select Range , One At A Time and Cancel.
AND following fields display: Row No and No Of Seats 
AND Seats Number field display: with empty cell (total 5)
AND under 'Add Seats: you will see Row and Seat display that you just added

title: Seating - Club Inventory - Update an existing section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Login into Comptix Site >>https://qabamutil.mlbcontrol.net/ticketing-admin/login.jsp
AND Select an Account: Team Name (Ex. Arizona Diamondback)
AND Select an User: Pick a name (ex. Prajapati,Krishna)
AND Click : Login button
custom_steps:
WHEN
Top right click User's name ex. Welcome (User's name)
AND Select >Roles>GlobalUser
AND Select>Admin Home
AND Click 'Venue' blue link 
AND Click 'Seating' red button 
AND select 'Club Inventory' tab and click 'Edit'  red buttton , select the new seats that you added in previous test case [Seating - Club Inventory - Add a new section] ex. Seat1
AND enter following fields: 
> Section #   Update from 'Seat1' to 'Seat1 Update'
>Pricing    updade from 100 to 200 
>Select Home/Visitor   : Home  - keep same
>Select Firend/Family  : Friend   -keep same
>Select Department    : Coaches  --keep same
AND click 'Save'  red button
custom_expected: THEN it should be updated. Section and Pricing fields should be updated.

title: Click "Create Default Departments" to generate defaults (if they do not already exist)
custom_expected:
If the following departments do not exist, they will be created.
-Coaches
-Executives
-Grounds
-Guests
-Players

title: Create a new department by clicking "Add New"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Login into Comptix Site >>https://qabamutil.mlbcontrol.net/ticketing-admin/login.jsp
AND Select an Account: Team Name (Ex. Arizona Diamondback)
AND Select an User: Pick a name (ex. Prajapati,Krishna)
AND Click : Login button
custom_steps:
WHEN
Top right click User's name ex. Welcome (User's name)
AND Select >Roles>GlobalUser
AND Select>Admin Home
Click 'DEPTS' blue link 
AND Click '+Add New' red button 
Enter following fields….
>Department Name: enter any name ex. New_Coach
>Select MLB Flow:  Select MLB Flow 
>Enable Ticket Partner Integrated Flow: OFF
>Enable Promo Button: OFF
>Home Ticket for Department:
Friend: 5
Family:5
>Default Guest User Quota: 4
>Weekend Ticket Expiration: leave empty
>Excess Seating Window: leave empty
>Away Ticket for Department:
Friend:2
Family:2
>Weekday Ticket Expiration:Leave empty
>No Reservation Until: Leave empty
>Enter link below for digital fulfillment email alert: www.mlb.com
AND Click 'Continue' button
custom_expected:
THEN
Depatments window display
AND 'Add New Department' window display
AND Verfiy that new Dept name added under Deparments window.

Rename only one 'Department Name' field only…

>Select MLB Flow:  Select MLB Flow 
>Enable Ticket Partner Integrated Flow: OFF
>Enable Promo Button: OFF
>Home Ticket for Department:
Friend: 5
Family:5
>Default Guest User Quota: 4
>Weekend Ticket Expiration: leve empty
>Excess Seating Window: leave empty
>Away Ticket for Department:
Friend:2
Family:2
>Weekday Ticket Expiration:eave empty
>No Reservation Until: eave empty
>Enter link below for digital fulfillment email alert: www.mlb.com
AND Click 'Continue' button
custom_expected:

Edit Depatments window display
AND Verfiy that Rename Dept name changed under Deparments window.

title: Edit - Verify you can enable/disable the Ticket Partner Integrated Flow if digital ticketing is supported
Edit - Verify you can enable/disable the promo functionality
Edit - Verify you can choose the MLB Flow if digital ticketing is supported
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Login into Comptix Site >>https://qabamutil.mlbcontrol.net/ticketing-admin/login.jsp
AND Select an Account: Team Name (Ex. Arizona Diamondback)
AND Select an User: Pick a name (ex. Prajapati,Krishna)
AND Click : Login button
custom_steps:
WHEN
Top right click User's name ex. Welcome (User's name)
AND Select >Roles>GlobalUser
AND Select>Admin Home
Click 'DEPTS' blue link 
AND On Edit Department page > Click 'Edit' red button for any department name ex. Coaches 
AND scroll down and find 'Enter link below for digital fulfillment email alert'  and Type  any link ex. www.mb.com
AND Click 'Continue' button 

Department Name: rename 'New_Couch' to 'Couch1' 
Select MLB Flow: Select MLB Flow
custom_expected:
THEN Edit Department page close automatic once clicked Continue button
AND Verify by clicking that same department ex. Coaches that link is displayed.

title: Edit - Verify you can set Family/Friend quotas for home/away games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Login into Comptix Site >>https://qabamutil.mlbcontrol.net/ticketing-admin/login.jsp
AND Select an Account: Team Name (Ex. Arizona Diamondback)
AND Select an User: Pick a name (ex. Prajapati,Krishna)
AND Click : Login button
custom_steps:
WHEN
Top right click User's name ex. Welcome (User's name)
AND Select >Roles>GlobalUser
AND Select>Admin Home
Click 'DEPTS' blue link 
AND On Edit Department page > Click 'Edit' red button for any department name ex. Coaches 
AND Find Home Ticket for Department: Friend and Family 
AND select 'Friend' drop down by clicking small red triangle AND select any number ex. 5 (max select = 15 and min select =0).
AND select 'Family' drop down by clicking small red triangle AND select any number ex. 5 (max select = 15 and min select =0).
AND Find Away Ticket for Department: Friend and Family 
AND select 'Friend' drop down by clicking small red triangle AND select any number ex. 5 (max select = 15 and min select =0).
AND select 'Family' drop down by clicking small red triangle AND select any number ex. 5 (max select = 15 and min select =0).
AND click 'Continue' button
custom_expected:
THEN Edit Department page close automatic once clicked Continue button
AND Verify by clicking that same department ex. Coaches and should see numbers -both Friend/Family- for Home/Away games.

title: Edit - Confirm you can set a ticket expiration for a department at a date/time
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Login into Comptix Site >>https://qabamutil.mlbcontrol.net/ticketing-admin/login.jsp
AND Select an Account: Team Name (Ex. Arizona Diamondback)
AND Select an User: Pick a name (ex. Prajapati,Krishna)
AND Click : Login button
custom_steps:
WHEN
Top right click User's name ex. Welcome (User's name)
AND Select >Roles>GlobalUser
AND Select>Admin Home
AND Click 'Events' blue link 
AND Click any one 'Edit' red button under Action
AND select 'Department'  ex. Coaches
AND 'Ticket Expiration' click calendar icon and select today's or future date with time.  ex. 12/21/2016 12:01PM
AND 'No Reservations Until' click calendar icon and select today's or future date with time.  ex. 12/22/2016 1:30PM
AND type any message for 'Add Message' field ex. ''Test''
AND click 'Save' button at the bottom of page.
custom_expected:
THEN 'Edit Event' window opens up. 
AND It saves information for that event you have selected.  To confirm go back and see if date/time saved.  see SS.

title: Edit - Confirm you can block reservations until a date/time
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Login into Comptix Site >>https://qabamutil.mlbcontrol.net/ticketing-admin/login.jsp
AND Select an Account: Team Name (Ex. Arizona Diamondback)
AND Select an User: Pick a name (ex. Prajapati,Krishna)

custom_steps:

AND Select>Admin Home
AND Click 'Events' blue link 
AND Click any one 'Edit' red button under Action
AND select 'Department' ex. Coaches
AND 'No Reservations Until' click calendar icon and select today's or future date with time. ex. 1/21/2017 12:00AM
AND 'Ticket Expiration' click calendar icon and select today's or future date with time. ex. 1/25/2016 1:30PM
AND type any message for 'Add Message' field ex. ''Test''
AND click 'Save' button at the bottom of page.
custom_expected:
THEN 'Edit Event' window opens up. 
AND It saves information for that event you have selected. To confirm go back and see if date/time saved. See SS.

title: Add a new security role
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User is signed in as a Comptix Admin
custom_steps:
WHEN
Click on Admin Home
AND click on Venues for the Arizona Diamondbacks team
AND click on ARI System Options > Site Security
AND under Create New Security Profile, write New Security Profile Name as: Test Profile
AND click on Add Profile
custom_expected:
THEN 
A new security profile with the name of Test Profile is added to the site security.

title: Update an existing security role
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User is signed in as a Comptix Admin
custom_steps:
WHEN
Click on Admin Home
AND click on Venues for the Arizona Diamondbacks team
AND click on ARI System Options > Site Security
AND under Edit Existing Profiles, select Test Profile from the Select Profile dropdown
AND for 'Will Call', click on DENIED
custom_expected:
THEN
An existing security role is updated.

title: Add a new relationship
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User is signed in as a Comptix Admin
custom_steps:
WHEN
Click on Admin Home
AND click on Venues for the Arizona Diamondbacks team
AND click on ARI System Options > Relationship Admin
AND click on Add New
AND Enter Relationship Type as: Bangash
AND select Preassigned from Seat Selection Mode drop down
AND click on Save
custom_expected:
THEN 
A new relationship is created

title: Update an existing relationship
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User is signed in as a Comptix Admin
custom_steps:
WHEN
Click on Admin Home
AND click on Venues for the Arizona Diamondbacks team
AND click on ARI System Options > Relationship Admin
AND for the Relationship type: Test, click on Edit
AND under the Edit New Section, changed the name from test to QA
AND click on Save
custom_expected:
THEN 
An existing relationship is edited

title: Delete the newly created relationship
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User is signed in as a Comptix Admin
custom_steps:
WHEN
Click on Admin Home
AND click on Venues for the Arizona Diamondbacks team
AND click on ARI System Options > Relationship Admin
AND for the Relationship type: Test, click on Edit
AND under the Edit New Section, click on Delete
AND a message pops up 'Do you want to delete this Admin Relationship Type?'
AND click on 'OK' deletes the relationship
custom_expected:
THEN
A relationship is deleted

WHEN
Click on 3 dots at the top right, 
AND click on Roles > Global Users
AND click on 3 dots at the top right and click on Admin Home
AND click on ARI REPORTS > RANGED UMPIRE RESERVATION REPORT
AND select Start Date: 04/01/2016
AND select End Date: 11/01/2016
AND select All Users
AND select Taxable
AND click on Create Report

THEN
Umpire Reservation Report for All user with Taxable is displayed

title: Confirm you can export the report to Excel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User is signed in to Arizona Diamondbacks team as Bangash, Nasir user
custom_steps:
WHEN
Click on 3 dots at the top right, 
AND click on Roles > Global Users
AND click on 3 dots at the top right and click on Admin Home
AND click on ARI REPORTS > RANGED UMPIRE RESERVATION REPORT
AND select Start Date: 04/01/2016
AND select End Date: 11/01/2016
AND select All Users
AND select Taxable
AND click on Create Report
AND click on Export to Excel
custom_expected:
THEN
Reservation report is exported to the Excel and can be opened in the Excel
